ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mob that Wouldn't Mez
ygData.msgSnippet: They were NEVER mezzed.  Never got a resist message - just got the initial message you get when singing SoT.  The Enchanter was unable to mez them either - and
ygData.messageBody:
They were NEVER mezzed. Never got a resist message - just got the initial
message you get when singing SoT. The Enchanter was unable to mez them
either - and in fact died the second time it happened. Both times I started
trying to mez it after the enchanter died; the second time we evaced out -
although I had gotten the mez to finally stick in between the time the Druid
cast the Evac and when it hit.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2001 8:01 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mob that Wouldn't Mez


If they were mezzed they couldnt cast :) Even if you mez them in mid cast
the spell is interupted.

Were the mobs resisting mez or breaking quickly?

Elfson Allegro 55 Veeshan
